text: LG Electronics' CLOi BaristaBot has obtained a "robot brewing master certificate" from the Korea Coffee Association. LG Electronics announced on Dec. 20 that the Korea Coffee Association awarded the certificate to the CLOi BaristaBot after evaluating its ability to produce optimal coffee based on an understanding of coffee extraction tools and methods. The Korea Coffee Association acknowledged that the taste of the coffee made by the LG CLOi Baristabot was on par with the coffee made by a brewing master. LG Electronics put a wide array of information about hand drip coffee such as types of coffee beans, degrees of grinding, water temperature, amounts and extraction time into the CLOi BaristaBot. LG engineers repeatedly put the CLOi BaristaBot to optimization tests to ensure that it makes delicious coffee.
